info.title: API For IndY
info.description:
I was söwa ned wos des eigentlich ois duat, is hoid fia IndY und so.

### Features:
- View and manage student data
- Track special IndY entries
- Manage room availability
- Support for role-based access: Admin, Teacher, and Student

Vü Spaß damit. Bei Frogn bitte an buchi@ambuchberg.com. Danke!

get.description:
Retrieve all students and their class assignments from the `student` and `studentclassassociation` tables.

- If the user is a **student**, only their own record is returned.
- If the user is a **teacher** or **admin**, all students are returned with class association.

Retrieve a specific student by SID from the `student` and `studentclassassociation` tables.

- If the user is a **student**, their own SID must be used.
- If the user is a **teacher** or **admin**, the SID of any student must be provided.

Returns the student’s personal information and class association.

Retrieve all teachers from the `teacher` table.

- Available to users with roles **Admin** and **Teacher**.
- Teachers can view the full list of teachers (e.g., for scheduling or contact purposes).

put.description: Update the area of expertise of a teacher.

get.description:
Retrieve a specific teacher by TID from the `teacher` table.

- If the user is a **teacher** or **admin**, they may specify any TID.

Retrieve all entries from the `indyhour` table, joined with the `teacher` table and 
`HourToTeacherAreaOfExpertiseAssociation` to include full teacher name and area of expertise.

The data is aggregated by (day, hour, teacher) and returned with optional expertise labels.

post.description:
Create a new `indyhour` entry as a logged-in teacher.

- Requires Teacher role.
- Uses the teacher's ID from the JWT token.
- Fails if indySheetChangeAble is disabled in the `config` table.
- Fails if the teacher is not found in the `teacher` table.

Create a new `indyhour` entry on behalf of a teacher as an Admin.

- Requires Admin role.
- Teacher ID must be explicitly provided in the URL path.
- Fails if the teacher does not exist in the `teacher` table.

get.description:
Retrieve all entries for the authenticated student.

- Role: Schueler (Student)
- Retrieves entries from the `entry` table based on the student's own ID.

Retrieve all entries for a specific student by SID.

- Role: Admin only
- Returns entries from the `entry` table for the given student ID.

Retrieve all entries for a given student and IndY date, grouped by hour and entry type.

- If the user is a student, `sid` is automatically set to their ID.
- Validates the provided date as an official IndY day.
- Aggregates entries from the tables: `entrynormal`, `entryschoolevent`, `entryabsence`, and `entryfreeroom`.
- Results are grouped by hour (3 and 4).

post.description:
Create a new normal entry for the authenticated student.

- Role: Schueler (Student)
- Validates that the entry date is not in the past.
- Checks teacher availability for the given hour and day.
- Ensures the student limit for the teacher/hour is not exceeded.
- Calls a function to create a general entry record.

get.description:
Retrieve all normal entries in the system.

- Roles: Admin and Teacher
- Returns all entries from the `entrynormal` table.

Retrieve all `entrynormal` entries for today.

- Roles: Admin and Teacher
- Includes the student’s class info from `studentclassassociation`.

Retrieve all normal entries for a specific student.

- Role: Schueler (only for their own sid) or Admin/Teacher (any sid)
- Returns all `entrynormal` records for the given student ID.

post.description:
Create a new free room entry for the authenticated student.

- Role: Schueler (Student)
- Calls the general `add_entry` function to create a base entry record.
- Adds additional details specific to free room entries (subject, house, floor, activity).

get.description:
Retrieve all entries from the `entryfreeroom` table.

- Accessible to **Admins** and **Teachers**.
- Returns a complete list of free room entries for all students.

Retrieve all free room entries for today.

- Roles: Admin and Teacher
- Includes student class information from `studentclassassociation`.

Retrieve all free room entries for a specific student.

- Role: Schueler (only for their own sid) or Admin/Teacher (any sid)
- Returns all `entryfreeroom` records for the given student ID.

post.description:
Create a new absence entry for the authenticated student.

- Role: Schueler (Student)
- Calls the shared `add_entry` function with the absence flag.
- Sets `entryPastPresent` flag based on whether the absence date is in the future.

get.description:
Retrieve all entries from the `entryabsence` table.

- Accessible to **Admins** and **Teachers**.
- Returns all absence entries for all students.

Retrieve all absence entries for today.

- Roles: Admin and Teacher
- Includes student class info from `studentclassassociation`.

Retrieve all absence entries for a specific student by SID.

- Returns all absence records for the given student ID.
- Students must provide their own sid.

post.description:
Create a new school event entry for the authenticated student.

- Role: Schueler (Student)
- Calls the shared `add_entry` function.
- Adds additional info like `tid` (teacher id) and optional `description`.

get.description:
Retrieve all entries from the `entryschoolevent` table.

- Accessible to **Admins** and **Teachers**.
- Returns a full list of school event entries.

Retrieve all school event entries for today.

- Roles: Admin and Teacher
- Includes related class info from `studentclassassociation`.

Retrieve all school event entries for a specific student by SID.

- Role: Schueler can only access their own entries.
- Returns entries from `entryschoolevent` for the given student.

Retrieve all valid IndY days between two dates.

- Valid days are Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays that pass IndY validation.
- Returns a list of date + weekday name.

Retrieve all valid IndY days between two dates including the student's status on each day.

- **Role**: `Schueler` (Student)
- Each returned date includes weekday name and student's status (e.g., entry type or "No entries found").

Retrieve all SpecialIndy sessions for a given date.

- A `SpecialIndy` is a subject-specific or custom session offered on selected days by teachers.

post.description:
Create a SpecialIndy session for multiple dates as a teacher.

- Requires active configuration to allow changes.
- Replaces existing `specialindy`, `entrynormal`, and `entry` records for the same time slot.
- Only users with role `Teacher` or `Admin` can use this endpoint.

Admin-only endpoint to create a SpecialIndy session for a specific teacher.

- Used when an Admin needs to set up sessions on behalf of a teacher.
- Requires teacher ID in path.
- Automatically cleans up overlapping `entrynormal` and `entry` records.

get.description:
Returns the number of students assigned to each teacher for every hour on a specific IndY day.

- Counts are based on `entrynormal` and `entryspecial` records.
- Missing combinations (teacher + hour) will be returned with a student count of 0.
Retrieve all active subjects (active = 1) from the `subject` table.

Retrieve all missing indy entries for the currently logged-in student.

- Requires the user to be authenticated as a `Schueler` (student).
- Returns a list of date and hour pairs where the student has no Indy entries.

Retrieve missing Indy entries for a specific student ID.

- Admins can use this to view missing entries for any student.
- Students can only request their **own** data.
- Raises 403 if a student attempts to access another student's data.

get.summary: Get Hours Normal Not Signed As Kv
Get Hours Not Signed Event As Kv
Get Hours Not Signed Special As Kv
Get Hours Not Signed Absence As Kv
Get Hours Free Room As Kv

get.description:
Retrieve the IndY report for the currently logged-in student.

- **Role**: `Schueler` (Student)
- Returns a list of all recorded IndY entries including date, hour, subject, etc.
- Also includes statistics such as total entered hours, total possible hours, absences, and subject distribution.

Retrieve the IndY report for a specific student.

- **Role**: `Teacher` or `Admin`
- A Student has to provide his own **sid**.
- Requires a valid `sid` (student ID) as path parameter.
- Returns a comprehensive list of the student's entries and associated statistics.

Get a list of all rooms.

- Returns all room entries from the `Room` table.

Get a list of rooms that are currently available (not booked) for a specific date.

- Role: Teacher or Admin required
- Checks room usage in the `indyhour` and `specialIndy` tables.
- Returns a filtered list of `Room` entries that are not in use on the given date.
- Defaults to today's date if no date is provided.
Returns all `house IDs`.
Returns all `floor IDs`.

post.description: Loading students from untis and saving them to the database
Lädt Fächer aus Untis und speichert sie in die DB
Lädt Klassen des aktuellen Schuljahres aus Untis und speichert sie in die DB
Lädt Klassen des aktuellen Schuljahres aus Untis und speichert sie in die DB
Lädt alle Schuljahre aus Untis und speichert sie in die DB

get.description:
Retrieve all teacher absences from the `teacherindyhourcancellations` table.

- Available to users with roles **Admin** , **Teacher** and **Schueler**.
- Returns a list starting from the current date.

post.description:
Create a new special indy entry for the authenticated student.

- Role: Schueler (Student)
- Validates that the entry date is not in the past.
- Checks teacher availability for the given hour and day.
- Ensures the student limit for the teacher/hour is not exceeded.
- Calls a function to create a general entry record.

get.description:
Retrieve all normal entries in the system.

- Roles: Admin and Teacher
- Returns all entries from the `entrynormal` table.

Retrieve all `entrynormal` entries for today.

- Roles: Admin and Teacher
- Includes the student’s class info from `studentclassassociation`.

Retrieve all normal entries for a specific student.

- Role: Schueler (only for their own sid) or Admin/Teacher (any sid)
- Returns all `entrynormal` records for the given student ID.
